## isStringArray() function

Check if a variable is an Array containing only strings

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isStringArray(input: unknown): input is Array<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | The variable to validate |

<b>Returns:</b>

input is Array&lt;string&gt;

True if the input is an array containing only strings
